00080 class String : public virtual Object {
00081     friend bool operator==(const String lhs, const String rhs);
00082     friend bool operator<(const String lhs, const String rhs);
00083     friend String operator+(const String lhs, const String rhs);
00084     //friend String operator%(const String lhs, const String rhs);
00085     friend String operator&(const String lhs, const String(*rhs)(const String));
00086     friend String operator&(const String(*lhs)(String), const String rhs);
00087     friend String operator*(const String lhs, const std::size_t len);
00088     friend std::ostream & operator<<(std::ostream& lhs, const String rhs);
00089 
00090     friend struct Hash<String>;

00500     struct Data {
00501 
00502         Data(size_t len) : data(len), refcount(1) { }
00503 
00504         virtual ~Data() { }
00505         Array<uchar> data;
00506         mutable std::size_t refcount;
00507     };
00508     mutable Data * strdata;
00509 
00510 };
00511 
00512 bool operator==(const String lhs, const String rhs);
00513 
00514 template<>
00515 struct Hash<String> {
00516 
00517     inline sint operator()(String s) {
00518         suint hash = 0;
00519         suint x = 0;
00520         suint i = 0;
00521         uchar * b = s.strdata->data.carray();
00522 
00523         for(i = 0; i < s.length(); b++, i++) {
00524             hash = (hash << 4) + (*b);
00525             if((x = hash & 0xF0000000L) != 0) {
00526                 hash ^= (x >> 24);
00527             }
00528             hash &= ~x;
00529         }
00530 
00531         return hash;
00532     }
00533 };
00534 
00535 inline bool operator==(const String lhs, const char* rhs) {
00536     return operator==(lhs, String(rhs));
00537 }
00538 
00539 inline bool operator==(const char* rhs, const String lhs) {
00540     return operator==(String(rhs), lhs);
00541 }
00542 bool operator<(const String lhs, const String rhs);
00543 String operator+(const String lhs, const String rhs);
00544 //String operator%(const String lhs, const String rhs);
